“The coronavirus pandemic hit the Volkswagen Group at the start of 2020, in the middle of one of
the largest transformation processes in the history of our Group.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
From the start, our focus has been
on protecting our employees and our business against the threat of COVID-19.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
Despite this massive
challenge, at the same time we further advanced the Group’s restructuring toward decarbonization
and mobility for future generations.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
My express thanks go to everyone who successfully contributed
to this, specifically to our 662,000 employees of the Volkswagen Group around the world and to our
stakeholders.”

Dr. Herbert Diess, Bernd Osterloh,
Chairman of the Board of Management Chairman of the General and
of Volkswagen AG Group Works Council of Volkswagen AG
Ladies and gentlemen,
Dear colleagues,
Volkswagen has lived up to its corporate responsibility even in 2020, the year of the coronavirus.
entities: Volkswagen AG Group Works Council of Volkswagen AG
label: unlabeled

sentence:
As one of the largest employers in the world, the Group coordinated and donated aid supplies
internationally, conducted 25,000 coronavirus tests, organized employee projects and produced
medical equipment.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
Thanks to the broad product portfolio and regional positioning, the Group
has remained financially robust while navigating the crisis.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
At the same time, addressing the consequences of the pandemic has provided an opportunity for
sustainable economic restructuring: in 2020, three times more electric vehicles were sold than in
the previous year.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
The Group has launched a unique e-model offensive with the Volkswagen ID.3
and ID.4, the Porsche Taycan, Audi e-tron and Skoda Enyaq iV as well as numerous hybrid models.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
In 2020, we tripled our unit sales of e-vehicles in the Group and were able to reduce our CO2 fleet
average in the EU by around 20 percent.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
We are convinced that the battery-electric drive is, for
the foreseeable future, the only solution for achieving the goals of the Paris Agreement.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
Within
the Group we have also set the goal of attaining a climate-neutral footprint worldwide by 2050
at the latest – this includes our supply chains, plants and business divisions and our customers’
use of the vehicles.
label: unlabeled

sentence: On our path to climate-neutral mobility, we seek to collaborate with society and politicians.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
We
believe that a reduction in CO2 emissions within the scope of the EU Green Deal of at least 55% by
2030 compared to 1990 levels is attainable, if the appropriate measures are implemented across
all sectors as part of a joint effort.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
As a member of the Europe-wide CEO Alliance, we are therefore
working on the cross-sectoral decarbonization of the economy.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
Volkswagen sees itself as part of
the solution, not the problem.
label: unlabeled

sentence: For Volkswagen, social sustainability is just as important as environmental.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
The focus on e-mobil-
ity will change employment at Volkswagen.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
A study carried out for Volkswagen by the Fraunhofer
4
DROWEROF
Institute has worked out exactly how.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
The experts say that in the next ten years, job creation, job
improvement and job elimination will coexist.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
The findings show that Volkswagen’s employ-
ment needs are going to fall less sharply than previous studies had suggested due to e-mobility
and digitalization.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
We can sustainably manage the transformation of the workforce if the right measures are intro-
duced.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
At Volkswagen, these primarily include additional training and retraining, the transfor-
mation of the components segment in the Group and the Digital Transformation Roadmap.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Profitability is a prerequisite for job security.
label: unlabeled

sentence: The Fraunhofer study was commissioned by the Volkswagen’s Sustainability Council.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
It contributes
external, international and cross-sectoral sustainability expertise to our strategies.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
In 2020, we
extended collaboration with the Council by a further two years.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
In addition to ad hoc management of the coronavirus crisis, Volkswagen has continued to focus
on its competitiveness, securing jobs, the future viability of jobs, protecting health and enabling a
work/life balance.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Our Social Charter has also undergone revision.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
We successfully completed the Monitorship in 2020 that was part of the agreements with the US
authorities following the diesel issue.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
In collaboration with Larry Thompson and his monitor
team, Volkswagen met its commitment to sustainably improve compliance within the Company.
label: unlabeled

sentence: The change in structures, processes and systems has made us a stronger business.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
Together
with our employees, we will continue work on the change in corporate culture in the future –
integrity is not a project with a beginning and an end but an ongoing task.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
As part of our sustainability strategy, we have succeeded in anchoring sustainability more firmly
in the Group’s core business.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
We set ourselves strong, measurable targets for the four focus areas
of decarbonization, circular economy, responsibility in the supply chain & business and trans-
formation of the workforce.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
This ensures an effective operationalization of sustainability, with
clear responsibilities and processes.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Sustainable business practices are also playing an increasingly important role for our investors.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
We are taking this into account by anchoring an ESG action plan in our Group strategy and in
doing so, want to contribute to permanently increasing our Company’s value.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
The Volkswagen
Group’s readmission to the UN Global Compact at the start of 2021 is another signal of confi-
dence for our stakeholders and at the same time proof of our strategy’s effectiveness.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
The “Shaping mobility – for generations to come” vision of our TOGETHER 2025+ Group strategy
guides us in all our activities.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
It is our responsibility to contribute to the sustainability of envi-
ronmental, social and economic systems for us and for generations to come.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
We are working on
this every day.
label: unlabeled

sentence:
Best regards,
Herbert Diess Bernd Osterloh
